about_the_game:
3DMark Ice Storm benchmarks are no longer supported. We recommend 3DMark Night Raid (DirectX 12) and 3DMark Wild Life (Vulkan) for benchmarking PCs with integrated graphics.

Ice Storm

  • For low cost smartphones and tablets
  • DirectX 11 feature level 9 benchmark test
  • 1280 × 720 rendering resolution

Ice Storm Extreme

  • For mainstream mobile devices
  • DirectX 11 feature level 9 benchmark test
  • 1920 × 1080 rendering resolution for graphics tests

Ice Storm Unlimited

  • Offscreen version of Ice Storm
  • DirectX 11 feature level 9 benchmark test
  • 1280 × 720 rendering resolution (offscreen)
detailed_description:
3DMark Ice Storm benchmarks are no longer supported. We recommend 3DMark Night Raid (DirectX 12) and 3DMark Wild Life (Vulkan) for benchmarking PCs with integrated graphics.

Ice Storm

  • For low cost smartphones and tablets
  • DirectX 11 feature level 9 benchmark test
  • 1280 × 720 rendering resolution

Ice Storm Extreme

  • For mainstream mobile devices
  • DirectX 11 feature level 9 benchmark test
  • 1920 × 1080 rendering resolution for graphics tests

Ice Storm Unlimited

  • Offscreen version of Ice Storm
  • DirectX 11 feature level 9 benchmark test
  • 1280 × 720 rendering resolution (offscreen)
name: 3DMark Ice Storm benchmarks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows Vista*
  • Processor:1.8 GHz dual-core
  • Graphics:DirectX 9
  • Storage:6 GB free space

Memory
  • Ice Storm:2 GB RAM and 128 MB video card memory
  • Ice Storm Unlimited:2 GB RAM and 128 MB video card memory
  • Ice Storm Extreme:4 GB RAM and 256 MB video card memory

* Ice Storm Extreme requires a 64-bit version of Windows. Windows 7 users must install Service Pack 1. Windows Vista users must install Service Pack 2 and the DirectX 11 platform update.

short_description: Includes three benchmark tests for tablets and smartphones.
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean
